title: Can't login at all! PBE and Main!
body:
Whenever I try to login to the PBE or my main account, the login screen first does "An unexpected error has occurred while logging in. Please try again" I try again, but It never leaves the authenticating stage. I literally waited an HOUR for it to change, but it didn't. I've tried restarting, nope. What the heck is going on here?! I've even sent a support ticket but that'll take forever 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Getting hung up on that authentication step can be a pretty good sign that your network is having problems reaching our login servers for one reason or another. Let's hit a few quick and easy troubleshooting steps first. Try updating your ports and flush your DNS, but make sure to go through the other steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.
